name: Shingeki no Tako
description: A cute squid just lost his family to a massive ancient civilization giants invasion. He is the only survivor by an inch, losing a few limbs in the process. He is going on his revenge quest, with the help of ancient projectile magic powers through a newly acquired body Controls: WASD to move, Space to use jet propulsion, Shift to dash (2 charges), Mouse to aim, Mouse click to shoot
